sense.def:
To revise something
pomeni nekaj spremeniti, da postane boljše ali pravilnejše.

seg.quote: The judges may revise their selection process.

sense.def:
To revise for an examination
pomeni znova prebrati podatke o študijski snovi, da bi jih bolje obvladali.

seg.quote: I've been revising for the last three days.
I was revising Dickens last night.
